descriptionHtml:
Name: Bran the Minstrel
Version: 1.0
Date: 2012/22/06



------------------- [This is what? ] -----------------------
Hello everybody, now have a look to this companion.
Another mod made from presets of my chars
Bran is a Nord.
Class: Lumberjack
Specialization; 1handed weapons, 2handed weapons, Light Armor.
Illusion and Healing spells.
Calculated Level 10 to 70
Essential and also can be married.
Initial Armor: Farm Clothes
Initial Weapon: Steel Sword


-------------------[Location]-------------------------------

Solitude, at Bards College


05.07.2012 - Version 2.0 added (minor bugs fixed)





------------------- [Install] -----------------------
Please copy and overwrite in the \\ Skyrim DATA folder 
NMM is recommended.
Put the checkmark at the SNBran .esp in your launcher or NMM 

Just delete the esp.file to uninstall the mod



------------------- [Licensing / Legal] -------------
Feel free to modify, just give me credit.
Thank you for all moder Bezesuda and made a great game


Enjoy!
Sandraniks
author: Sandraniks
